mapper.select: SELECT B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD AS subjectTypeCd , A.GRP_DTL_NM AS grpDtlNm , A.GRP_DTL_CD AS grpDtlCd , COUNT(*) AS quizCnt FROM CMMN_DTL_CD A, QUIZ_MSTR_INFO B WHERE A.GRP_DTL_CD = B.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD AND A.GRP_CD = '002' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.DEL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, A.GRP_DTL_NM ORDER BY A.SRT_NO;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' AND SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = #{subjectTypeCd}

SELECT A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , A.EXAM_YEAR , A.EXAM_GRP_CD ,
, A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD ,
, A.EXAM_NO , A.SRT_NO , A.CONTENT , A.ANSWER , A.CMNTR , B.QUIZ_USER_ANS_SEQ , B.USER_ID , B.USER_ANSWER , B.ANSWER_CHK , B.USER_CHK_IMPRT , B.USER_CHK_CNFSD FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO A LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM QUIZ_USER_ANS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) B ON A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = B.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.EXAM_GRP_CD = #{examGrpCd} AND A.EXAM_YEAR = #{examYear} AND A.EXAM_NO = #{examNo} AND A.SUBJECT_TYPE_CD = #{subjectTypeCd} ORDER BY A.SRT_NO LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE QUIZ_MSTR_INFO SET DEL_YN = 'Y' , MDFY_TS = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ , EXAM_YEAR , EXAM_GRP_CD , EXAM_NO , SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , SRT_NO , CONTENT , ANSWER , CMNTR FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ = #{quizMstrInfoSeq}
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUBJECT_TYPE_CD, SRT_NO) AS rno , SUBJECT_TYPE_CD , SRT_NO , QUIZ_MSTR_INFO_SEQ FROM QUIZ_MSTR_INFO WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT 1
